start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Harness in the ISO 8601 format, i.e YYYY-MM-DDTmm:HH:ssZ. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

cutoff_days.title: Harness Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch deployments updated after cutoff

page_size.title: Harness Page Size
page_size.description: number of pipelines (builds) to fetch per call

deployment_timeout.title: Harness Deployment Timeout
deployment_timeout.description: Max number of hours to consider for a deployment to be running/queued before giving up on syncing it
